pageContext.claim: “That's locker room. That's locker room talk.”
pageContext.analysis: Much like disgraced Hollywood mogul Harvey Weinstein, Trump has been accused of sex harassment and unwanted sexual advances by many women, many of whom told others about the encounters at the time. In referring to "locker room" talk, Trump appears to be referencing the Hollywood Access tape in which he was overheard saying: “When you’re a star, they let you do it. Grab ’em by the pussy. You can do anything.” But the allegations against Trump amount to more than bragging in private.
